test_scenarios.name: File Creation Test
test_scenarios.command: Create a meeting notes document titled 'Test Meeting' and write 'This is a test document created by Aura'
test_scenarios.expected_content: This is a test document created by Aura

test_scenarios.name: Spreadsheet Analysis Test
test_scenarios.command: Analyze my sample budget spreadsheet and calculate the total income

test_scenarios.name: Document Summary Test
test_scenarios.command: Summarize the technical overview document in three bullet points
test_scenarios.expected_result: Three coherent bullet points about Aura
